output:
John Smith
Finance Accountant 
 
Summary:
Dedicated professional with 5 years of experience in finance, accounting, and tax preparation. Skilled in streamlining procedures, reducing costs, and collaborating with clients. Versed in GAAP and internal controls.
 
Experience:
Finance Accountant, ABC Corporation, July 2015 - Present 
• Perform monthly reconciliations, ensuring accuracy of client financial statements.
• Participate in annual audits with external auditors, including interviewing staff and preparing financial statements.
• Monitor accounts payable, accounts receivable, and cash flow to ensure adequate cash balances for clients.
• Prepare monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports.
• Maintain internal control systems and procedures compliant with GAAP.

Education:
Bachelor of Science in Accounting, XYZ University, August 2011 - June 2015
• Member, Accounting Student Association
• Completed semester abroad in Spain
